author: LGR
description:
Headed back to 1987 with The Computer Chronicles for Christmas! Their holiday buying guides from the mid 80s into the 1990s are some of the coziest TV episodes. Grab a refreshing beverage and join me in watching and researching seasonal retro computing goodness!

● LGR things elsewhere:
https://www.patreon.com/LazyGameReviews
https://www.twitter.com/LazyGameReviews
https://www.facebook.com/LazyGameReviews

● Watch or download the full episode here:
https://archive.org/details/CC506_buyers_guide

● Background music licensed from Epidemic Sound:
https://www.epidemicsound.com

00:00 a clone-laden intro
01:00 Xmas 1987 begins!
02:06 Sony and surprise Vector
06:18 shopping mall PC store
09:31 software gift ideas
15:23 hardware gifts
29:59 Random Access news
35:25 outroduction

#LGR #Christmas #tv #retro
title: 1987 Computer Chronicles Christmas Buyer's Guide 🎁
